participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Caring and sociable, enjoys spending time with family and friends.
participant_1.background: I have two kids, I enjoy being on social media. I love Mexican food. I work at an animal clinic. I love the summer.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Curious and creative, loves technology and trying new recipes.
participant_2.background: I use third-party programs to read portable documents instead of Adobe. I love eating shrimp, and I like to dip them into barbecue sauce. I have a small beagle dog who I call Droopy. I enjoy eating pumpkins. I enjoy watching videos on YouTube.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1. What's your name?
Hi, I'm participant_2. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my family, go out to eat, and read. What about you?
I like to watch YouTube videos, play video games, and cook.
I love cooking too! What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love making shrimp tacos. I use my own recipe for the shrimp, and I dip them in barbecue sauce.
That sounds delicious! I love shrimp.
I also have a beagle dog named Droopy. He's the cutest little thing.
I love beagles! I had one growing up.
Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have two kids.
Oh, that's great! I love kids.
They're a lot of work, but they're also a lot of fun.
I'm sure they are.
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a software engineer.
Oh, that's cool! I've always been interested in computer science.
It's a great field. I love it.
I can imagine. It must be really rewarding.
It is. I love being able to create things that people use every day.
That's awesome.
Thanks.
